Neighbours table

neighbours_table.Rd

A correspondence table of all countries and their neighbours.

Usage

neighbours_table

Format

An object of class tbl_df (inherits from tbl, data.frame) with 634 rows and 4 columns.

Details

Columns:

  • country_id: country iso3 code

  • neighbour_id: neighbouring country iso3 code

  • border_id: primary key, combination of country_id-neighbour_id

  • border_length: shared border estimated length

On this page

This application was developed by Ardata for CIRAD, with the aim of providing a tool for assessing epidemiological risk using spatial analysis in RShiny

Site built with pkgdown 2.1.3.
